title: What to expect from Rory and Scottie, and how will Royal Portrush play?
content: Is Scottie Scheffler the overwhelming favorite? Is Rory McIlroy's game rounding into form? We look at five storylines to watch this week at the Open Championship.

title: Source: Vet Miller to Commanders on 1-year deal
content: The Commanders are signing veteran defensive end Von Miller, a move designed to bolster their pass rush and increase their ability to close out games on defense.

title: Former Texans, Eagles LB Braman dies at 38
content: Former Texans and Eagles linebacker Bryan Braman has died after seeking treatment this year for a rare, aggressive form of cancer, according to his agent. He was 38.

title: Biles, SGA, Eagles capture top honors at ESPYS
content: Olympic champion gymnast Simone Biles and NBA Finals MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander took home top athlete honors, while the Super Bowl champion Eagles won best team at The ESPYS.

title: Arsenal signs Smith in record for women's soccer
content: Arsenal have confirmed the signing of Olivia Smith, with sources telling ESPN that it is a world record fee and the first £1 million transfer in women's football.

title: Miami 'outclassed' as historic Messi streak ends
content: Lionel Messi's MLS record streak of scoring two goals in a game ended at five as Inter Miami CF lost 3-0 to FC Cincinnati on Wednesday night.

title: Sources: 49ers' Collins third Round 2 pick in fold
content: The 49ers' agreement with DT Alfred Collins is worth $10.3 million over four years and includes $9M guaranteed, sources told ESPN. He becomes just the third second-round pick this year to have signed with his team (Carson Schwesinger, Jayden Higgins).

title: D-backs star Marte's home robbed during break
content: Police are investigating a burglary that is believed to have happened Tuesday night at a home owned by Diamondbacks star Ketel Marte.

title: 5-star Boozer: Duke 'overlooked,' but not for long
content: Five-star prospect and incoming Duke freshman Cameron Boozer told ESPN on Wednesday the Blue Devils have been "overlooked" this offseason following the departures of Cooper Flagg and other NBA talent.

title: 📷 Stars shine on the ESPYS red carpet
content: The stars shined on the red carpet before heading into the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles for the 33rd annual ESPYS.

title: Who will be the No. 1 pick in the 2026 NFL draft? We predicted chances for 14 top prospects
content: Which quarterback could go first overall? What about edge rusher T.J. Parker or another non-QB? Let's project the race.

title: The top 10 cornerbacks ahead of 2025 NFL season: Who is ranked after Pat Surtain II?
content: Who are the best cornerbacks in the NFL? We asked execs, coaches and scouts from around the league to rank their top 10.

title: B- for the Fever? A- for Valkyries? Grading every WNBA team at midseason
content: The Valkyries join the Lynx and Mercury near the front of the class, while the Fever and Sky have improved marks.

title: Passan: Inside the first swing-off in MLB All-Star Game history
content: On a night full of firsts, none resonated as much as the finale -- and Kyle Schwarber's titanic performance.

title: From New Jersey to Madrid via Brazil, Atlético is next big step for USMNT's Johnny Cardoso
content: Johnny Cardoso had a difficult summer with the U.S., but joining Atlético Madrid is a chance to step up and meet a new challenge. He's used to that.

title: 2025 MLB draft recap: Best picks, biggest steals and analysis for all 30 teams
content: Now that all 20 rounds are complete, it's time to see what Kiley McDaniel makes of your team's draft haul.

title: The 10 MLB trends that ruled the first half -- and whether they'll continue
content: From chaos in the AL East to emerging young sluggers, we break down the season's biggest themes and what we should expect down the stretch run.

title: Why a 46-year-old Pacquiao is boxing again
content: Manny Pacquiao is back to a familiar place in Los Angeles, looking for a new start and to add to his legendary career.

title: Building Duke's all-time roster: Does Cooper Flagg make the cut?
content: Some names were obvious (Hill, Laettner). Others sparked a debate (Flagg, Williamson). But we think we got the all-time roster right.

title: 'I'm like, I know it's you': Arch Manning, Lane Kiffin headline top SEC media day quotes
content: Conference media days are always ripe with quality quotes, and the witticisms from Atlanta did not disappoint.

title: Girelli shows Norway how to be clinical as Italy reach Euro 2025 semifinal
content: Italy are in their first Euro semifinal since 1997 as Cristiana Girelli netted a brace and Norway's Ada Hegerberg struggled.

title: Revitalized Sweden pose serious threat to England
content: Three years ago when the teams met, the score was one-sided. This Swedish team is a different proposition, though.

title: Sources: De Paul to join Miami on loan from Atleti
content: Rodrigo De Paul is set to join Inter Miami CF from Atlético Madrid on a loan deal to make the move permanent, sources have told ESPN.

title: Yamal given Messi's iconic Barça No. 10 jersey
content: Lamine Yamal has been handed the iconic Barcelona No. 10 shirt previously worn by Lionel Messi, the Catalan club confirmed Wednesday.

title: Nico Williams explains 10-year Athletic extension
content: Nico Williams said he wants to continue making history at Athletic Club having turned down offers to leave the Basque outfit this summer.

title: Poland hire new coach after Lewandowski fallout
content: Jan Urban has been appointed as Poland national manager, the country's football association (PZPN) said on Wednesday, with the 63-year-old replacing Michal Probierz who resigned in June.

title: 'Proud' Italy end 28-year wait to reach semifinals
content: An ecstatic Italy coach Andrea Soncin credited past players for paving the way after clinching their first Women's Euro semifinal berth since 1997.

title: 'Great club legend' Vázquez's time in Madrid over
content: Lucas Vázquez, an important player for Real Madrid during one of its most successful eras, is ending his stint with the Spanish powerhouse.

title: Freese 'devastated' but hungry after Mexico loss
content: USMNT goalkeeper Matt Freese said he felt devastated following the Gold Cup final loss to Mexico, but insists it will be motivation for the World Cup.

title: Alexander-Arnold transformed Liverpool. Will he do the same for Real Madrid?
content: Trent Alexander-Arnold left the Premier League as one of its best players ever. Whether he can reach similar heights in LaLiga as a Real Madrid player will be fascinating to watch.

title: Ward, McMillan and others primed to follow path of 2024 breakouts
content: These players are in position to follow a similar path to last year's breakouts and produce big numbers.

title: Year 2 player spotlight: Maye, Harrison, Odunze among popular breakouts
content: The ESPN Fantasy staff lists NFL sophomores who are undervalued in drafts and others who are under scrutiny.

title: Waiver wire: Start the second half strong with these pickups
content: As the MLB season's second half gets ready to begin, here are the players you should claim off the fantasy waiver wire.

title: Behind the scenes with a heavyweight champion
content: ESPN goes behind the scenes in camp with Oleksandr Usyk ahead of his undisputed heavyweight title fight against Daniel Dubois on July 19.

title: X factors for every Top 25 team: What could make (or break) the season
content: Every team has a key player, position group or situation that could swing its season. We break them all down.

title: Ranking CFB's best coaches, from Ryan Day and Dabo Swinney to ... Rhett Lashlee?
content: Is Ryan Day a genius or could anyone win at Ohio State? We break down 20 years of sideline overachievers.

title: AKG Museum getting ready at Peralassery in Kannur promises immersive experience into a revolutionary’s life
content: The museum promises a multi-dimensional experience of A.K Gopalan’s life, struggles, and political journey. With a total outlay of ₹25 crore, the initiative is being implemented in multiple phases

title: In a rare move, Supreme Court reviews judgment to comfort ‘anxious’ child in custody case
content: In an open court hearing, which is itself a rare occurrence, the Bench headed by Justice Vikram Nath concluded its judgment in the custody case had a ‘calamitous effect’ on the mental health of the boy

title: Madras High Court attempts to find solution for rental dispute between Tambaram Police Commissionerate and its landlords
content: Justice N. Anand Venkatesh asks Advocate General P.S. Raman and the counsel for the landlords to file a calculation memo for an enhanced monthly rent

title: Over 5.76 lakh Bihar electors are enrolled at multiple places: EC data
content: Official data states that out of nearly 7.90 crore electors, over 35.69 lakh were not found at their addresses during the house-to-house visit of booth-level officers

title: ED raid on promoters of Shushruti Souhardha Bank in Bengaluru
content: ED claims to have unearthed 20 more high-value properties not identified by authorities of government of Karnataka earlier

title: Telangana weather | Heavy rainfall alert in seven districts on July 18
content: Thunderstorms accompanied with lightning and strong surface winds are very likely at isolated places in all 33 districts

title: Madras HC Chief Justice constitutes larger Bench to hear dispute over removal of flagpoles from public places
content: Communist Party of India (Marxist) State secretary P. Shanmugam had contended that it was the democratic right of political parties to display their flags

title: ED files chargesheet against Robert Vadra, others in Haryana land deal case
content: This is the first time that any probe agency has filed a prosecution complaint against 56-year-old Robert Vadra in a criminal case.

title: Man rapes 10-year-old girl returning from school near Gummidipoondi; special teams on lookout for accused
content: Efforts are under way to trace the suspect, who may have crossed over to Andhra Pradesh; special teams have been deployed for the search

title: From canteen boy to author: Malayali writer Jalal Rahman’s book now in Arabic
content: Forced to quit school at age of 12 to support his family, Jalal Rahman, now based in Saudi Arabia, has released Dikrayath Jalal Rahman Al Khaleejil Arabi, the Arabic translation of his second book Angum Ingum Engum

title: Continue Operation Sindoor till Pahalgam terror attack perpetrators are apprehended or killed: AIMIM chief Owaisi
content: Mr. Owaisi criticised Jammu & Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha for his recent remarks in which he took “full responsibility” for the attack

title: Temple entry cannot be denied based on caste in a country governed by rule of law: Madras High Court
content: Justice N. Anand Venkatesh directs Ariyalur Superintendent of Police to ensure the entry of all devotees, irrespective of their caste, into Puthukudi Ayyanar Temple in Udayarpalayam taluk

title: 30 Congress MLAs suspended from Chhattisgarh Assembly for a day for ruckus over DAP fertilizer supply
content: Speaker Raman Singh announced the suspension of 30 Congress MLAs, including Leader of Opposition Charan Das Mahant and former Chief Minister Bhupesh Baghel, and asked them to go outside the House.

title: Inscription on 1000-year-old copper plate found in Telangana’s Kodad sheds light on earliest recorded Kakatiya genealogy
content: The three-leaf copper plate, found in a graveyard at Kodad town, is preserved by the Department of Heritage in Hyderabad

title: Air India crash probe focuses on actions of plane's captain: reports
content: The First Officer, who was flying the Boeing 787 Dreamliner, asked the more experienced captain why he moved the fuel switches to the "cutoff" position seconds after lifting off the runway, the report said

title: Government proposes increasing industrial and commercial electricity tariff in Karnataka, and reduce for IP sets
content: Wants to reduce tariff on LT 4(a) — the irrigation pump set category — and increase the tariff for industrial and commercial consumers to cover revenue gap of ₹4,620 crore

title: Imphal-bound IndiGo plane returns to Delhi due to technical snag
content: A minor technical snag was detected soon after take-off on flight 6E 5118 operating from Delhi to Imphal on 17 July 2025. As a precautionary step, the pilots decided to turn-back and landed safely in Delhi, IndiGo said in a statement

title: Opposition stages 'pumpkin protest', claims government did nothing to address people's issues
content: They chanted slogans like "loan waiver for farmers - a pumpkin", "healthcare for people - a pumpkin", "rights for tribals - a pumpkin", and "education for students and jobs for workers - a pumpkin".

title: Probe into planting of bugging device under way: PMK founder Ramadoss
content: Speaking to reporters, Mr. Ramadoss said a police investigation was under way to determine who had placed the device

title: Schools shut in three Jharkhand districts amid heavy rains
content: "The administration has decided to keep all schools closed on July 17, in view of the incessant rain in Palamu district," the administration said in a release

title: Actor Nivin Pauly, director Abrid Shine booked for allegedly cheating producer in film investment dispute
content: Complainant accuses duo of deliberately concealing film’s actual registration details to defraud him of his investment

title: National Sports Governance Bill: Drafted with inputs from international bodies also, says Sports Minister Mansukh Mandaviya
content: Mansukh Mandaviya reiterated his commitment to have the Bill passed for which he has even held discussions with former Sports Minister and Congress leader Ajay Maken

title: Puri stampede: 147 people record statements before inquiry team
content: These people recorded their statements before Development Commissioner-cum-Additional Chief Secretary Anu Garg, who is leading the administrative inquiry, the officials said

title: Kerala Education Minister calls for urgent safety audit at schools after student’s death by electrocution
content: Minister Sivankutty says government routinely issues checklist for school managements to tick off before reopening

title: AI 171 crew deserve respect, not unfounded character judgment: Pilots' association ALPA India
content: The crew of AI 171 made every possible effort — till their very last breath — to protect the passengers on board and minimize harm on the ground. They deserve respect, not unfounded character judgments, says The Air Line Pilots' Association - India

title: India can secure oil even if Russian imports sanctioned, says Oil Minister Puri
content: He noted there are many new suppliers coming into the market, such as Guyana, and there is supply from existing producers such as Brazil and Canada.

title: Europe's Oldest Lake Settlement From 8,000 Years Ago Found In Albania
content: Archaeologists working on the shores of Ohrid Lake in Albania are convinced they have uncovered the oldest human settlement built on a European lake, finding evidence of an organised hunting and farming community living up to 8,000 years ago.

title: Probe Agency Chargesheet Against Robert Vadra In Gurugram Land Deal Case
content: The Enforcement Directorate has filed a charge sheet against Robert Vadra, the businessman husband of Congress MP Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, in a money laundering case linked to a land deal in Haryana's Shikohpur, official sources said on Thursday.

title: "Not Unduly Worried": Minister On US Tariff Threat Over Russian Oil
content: Union Minister of Petroleum and Natural Gas Hardeep Singh Puri on Thursday said India has diversified its sources for buying oil in the global market, due to which the government is not "unduly worried" over any US crackdown on Russia's oil exports.

title: When The US Bombed This Japanese City 12 Hours Before WWII Ended
content: World War II was hours from ending when the sky over Japan's Kumagaya turned orange. In one corner of the city, a woman gave birth.

title: Who Is 'Vivacious Varenya', 10-Year-Old Assam Girl On The Ranveer Show
content: A 10-year-old girl from Assam is making waves on social media with her fluent English, expressive videos, and remarkable confidence.

title: UK To Lower Voting Age To 16 In Landmark Electoral Reform
content: The British government is planning to lower the voting age to 16 by the next general election in a major overhaul of the country's democratic system.

title: Adani Enterprises Sells 20% Stake In AWL Agri Business To Wilmar International
content: Adani Enterprises Ltd (AEL) said on Thursday that it has signed an agreement to sell a 20 per cent stake in AWL Agri Business Ltd. to Wilmar International's subsidiary, Lence Pte Ltd, for Rs 275 per share, valuing the deal at Rs 7,150 crore.

title: Next Indian Astronaut To Fly In Indigenous Spacecraft: Union Minister
content: Shubhanshu Shukla's successful space odyssey has provided expertise for India's future voyages and the next Indian astronaut will travel in an indigenously built spacecraft, Union Minister Jitendra Singh

title: House Under Demolition Has No Link With Satyajit Ray, Never Did: Bangladesh
content: The dilapidated one-storey house in Bangladesh's Mymensingh, which several reports had identified as Satyajit Ray's ancestral home, has no connection with the legendary filmmaker, the Bangladesh government has said

title: Delhi Man Killed For Resisting Mobile Snatching, Attackers Bury His Body
content: An 18-year-old boy, who went missing three months ago, was allegedly killed and buried by four persons after he resisted a mobile phone snatching bid in Delhi's Alipur area, sources said on Thursday.

title: Kerala Teen Gets Electrocuted In School While Fetching Footwear From Rooftop
content: In a tragic incident, a 13-year-old boy was electrocuted while trying to retrieve his footwear from the school's rooftop in Kerala on Thursday.

title: Delhi Court Convicts Man For Using Vulgar Language, Outraging Woman's Modesty
content: Man convicted in a verdict reinforcing the right of women to live with dignity and without fear, under Sections 506 (Part II) and 509 of the IPC for criminal intimidation and using obscene and abusive language intended to outrage a woman's modesty.

title: On Patna Hospital's CCTV: 5 Men With Guns, A Murderer Shot Dead In Hospital
content: Five armed men entered a Bihar hospital, casually walked to a patient's room, pumped bullets into him, and escaped. No, this is not a movie scene. This is Bihar's horrifying reality.

title: NDTV Exclusive: On Bihar Murders, Top Cop Links Crime Rise To Season
content: A string of violent crimes, including the broad-daylight killing of a murder convict inside a Patna hospital, has once again brought the law and order situation in Bihar under scrutiny ahead of the Assembly elections scheduled this year.

title: 54 Dead In 24 Hours As Heavy Rain Hits Pakistan, Death Count Rises To 180
content: Heavy rains have been linked to 54 deaths in the past 24 hours in Pakistan, taking the toll to about 180 since the arrival of the monsoon in late June, the government's disaster agency said on Thursday.

title: Manipur's Haofa Dog Breed Now In Assam Rifles Unit
content: Haofa is an indigenous dog breed from the Manipur, valued for its sharp hunting instincts and loyalty. Two types of Haofa are commonly recognised: a smaller breed, and a larger one with a short bluish-black coat, long muzzle, and broad jaws.

title: "Where Is Phase 2": Musk Stirs Epstein Pot Again After Trump Fires Prosecutor
content: Elon Musk has once again targeted the Trump administration over the refusal to release documents related to disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein, appearing to suggest the denial may be due to the mention of US President Donald Trump's name in the case

title: 2-Day Anti-Terror Drill Across Delhi Starts Today
content: A two-day anti-terror preparedness exercise began in the national capital on Thursday, with drills scheduled at more than 10 locations across Delhi on July 17 and 18.

title: Higher Dose of This Antibiotic Can Help In Tuberculosis Recovery: Study
content: A higher dose of rifampicin -- a bactericidal antibiotic used primarily to treat tuberculosis (TB) -- may be safe, and its use can potentially lead to recurrence-free survival in patients with pulmonary TB, according to a recent study by ICMR.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool to rival Newcastle for Frankfurt's Ekitike
content: Liverpool have joined the race to sign Eintracht Frankfurt forward Hugo Ekitike. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Akash Prime successfully tested in Ladakh by Indian Army
content: Akash Prime is an upgraded version of the Akash system, equipped with an indigenous active Radio Frequency (RF) seeker for enhanced precision irrespective of weather and terrain.

title: Two tribals killed, 19 injured as mini goods carrier topples near Aliyar in Coimbatore
content: The police said that the accident occurred around 8.15 a.m. when the vehicle carrying 20 persons from Navamalai — 15 men and five women — approached Chinnarpathi on the Pollachi-Valparai Road

title: Senior Maoist couple surrenders before Telangana’s Rachakonda Police after 45 years underground
content: The couple expressed their desire to live peacefully with their families and give up the armed movement they were part of for over four decades

title: Rahul Gandhi slams Election Commission over Bihar Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls
content: Opposition parties have asserted that the ongoing exercise will disfranchise crores of eligible Indian citizens for the want of citizenship documents.

title: Monsoon continues to disrupt life across Himachal Pradesh; claims 109 lives in nearly one month
content: Of these, 64 people lost their lives in rain-related incidents, while 45 died in road accidents, underlining the extensive human toll of this year's monsoon fury, as per a State report

title: One killed after eviction drive in Assam’s Goalpara turns violent
content: This was the second operation in the Paikan Reserve Forest since July 12, when about 140 hectares were cleared of encroachment

title: CBI facilitated return of 134 fugitives from abroad in past 5 years: officials
content: The process of extradition has three stages: issuance of a Red Notice by Interpol, geolocation of the fugitive, and third, extradition after legal and diplomatic manoeuvres, all of which are time-consuming processes.

title: Electrocution of school student: Kerala government orders inquiry
content: Minister Sivankutty says Director of General Education has been dispatched to accident site in Kollam to investigate the episode and give a detailed report

title: Student dies after coming into contact with live wire at school in Kerala’s Kollam
content: According to reports, 13-year-old was electrocuted while trying to retrieve a slipper that had fallen onto the roof of bicycle shed

title: Kavitha demands Telangana CM’s resignation over Banakacherla project
content: If Revanth Reddy does not lead an all-party delegation to Delhi during the upcoming Parliament sessions, Jagruti will go to Delhi and fight on behalf of Telangana, warned Kavitha

title: Trust moves Madras High Court against party flag of Vijay’s TVK
content: Thondai Mandala Saandror Dharma Paribalana Sabai, a trust based in Chennai, claims that the TVK flag is “deceptively” similar to its registered trademark

title: Prisoner admitted in private hospital shot dead in Patna
content: According to the police, the deceased was identified as Chandan Mishra, a resident of Buxar district and he was a dreaded criminal and imprisoned in Beur Jail in connection with a murder case.

title: Justice Sanjeev Sachdeva sworn in as Chief Justice of Madhya Pradesh High Court
content: Madhya Pradesh Governor Mangubhai Patel administered the oath of office to Justice Sanjeev Sachdeva at a function in the Raj Bhawan in Bhopal.

title: In a first, State-run bus service starts in Maoist-hit Maharashtra village
content: The bus service from the remote Markanar village to Aheri has been started for the first time since independence, and it is set to benefit nearly 1,200 residents

title: Cyberabad records first property attachment under BNSS in multi-crore fraud case
content: The case pertains to an employee of a private company who in collusion with other accused manipulated invoices and freight charges to siphon off large sums of money

title: Court orders to file case against P.C. George over hate speech
content: Mr. George alleged that those belonging to a particular community were nurturing a generation that believed that others had no right to live

title: Odisha bandh: Normal life partially hit as Congress, other parties observe bandh to condemn Balasore student death
content: The Home Department has directed all district collectors and SPs to remain on high alert in view of the road blockades, picketings, agitations, and also cautioned them against violence during the 12-hour bandh.

title: Fire mishap at Durodine Industries in Hyderabad; no casualties or injuries reported
content: An investigation is under way to determine the cause of the fire and assess the full extent of the damage

title: Congress demands scraping of digital attendance system for MNREGA workers
content: Recently the government in a direction to the States flagged the various ways National Mobile Monitoring System (NMMS) used to digitally capture attendance of workers is being manipulated

title: Nimisha Priya execution: Won’t grant pardon, says family of Yemeni victim
content: Social media posts purportedly by Talal’s brother Abdul Fatah Mahdi indicated the family’s resolute stance on retribution as per Islamic law rather than accepting blood money and pardon Nimisha Priya

title: Enforcement Directorate raids premises in U.P., Mumbai linked to Chhangur Baba amid religious conversion ‘racket’ allegations
content: The federal probe agency recently filed a case to probe the activities and financial details of Jalaluddin alias Chhangur Baba, alleged to be a mastermind of an illegal religious conversion racket operating in Uttar Pradesh

title: Some cities in the northwestern, northern Indo-Gangetic Plain shielded from long-range aerosol pollution
content: Researchers refer to the cities that show relatively lower aerosol levels compared with the surrounding areas as Urban Aerosol Clean Islands

title: Nitish Kumar announces free electricity up to 125 units in poll-bound Bihar
content: Bihar CM said the government has also decided to install solar power plants on the rooftops or in the nearby public places of domestic consumers in the next three years

title: Amarnath Yatra suspended from Jammu due to bad weather
content: The yatra was suspended from both Pahalgam and Baltal base camps following heavy rains and landslides

title: Kudumbashree’s ‘Jana Galsa’ to give tribal art forms a new lease of life
content: Project will transform tribal art forms into viable enterprises that can generate employment and income for the indigenous people

title: Jagan acting like a destructive force, says TDP MLA Nakka Ananda Babu
content: It was Jagan Mohan Reddy who had governed the State in an authoritarian manner for five years, registered false cases against thousands and empowered the police system to achieve his personal vendetta against the opposition leaders, he alleges

title: Two shootings in 12 hours: Multiple teams deployed to trace absconding suspects
content: The attackers, believed to be four to five in number, have been identified and are currently on the run

title: West Bengal once again, without explanation, delays UG admission to colleges run and aided by it
content: Lakhs of students applying for these colleges staring at uncertainty while private/autonomous institutions are set to begin classes shortly

title: Nitish Kumar asks education department to speed up recruitment of teachers
content: Opposition Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) termed the announcement of Chief Minister as a mere election slogan and it will get stuck in the model code of conduct (MCC).

title: 41,193 children rescued, 4960 missing women traced under Operation Muskan: CM Fadnavis
content: The issue of missing women was raised in the assembly after Shiv Sena (UBT) MLC Sunil Shinde asked for the status of the proposal to ‘Track missing women’.

title: Tripura CM claims incumbent BJP-led coalition government provided nearly 20,000 regular jobs
content: Dr Manik Saha advised youths to take advantage of entrepreneurship engagements and not to wait only for government jobs

title: Bihar government set up cell to maintain data bank of Supari killers
content: The Bihar Police also suspended a station house officer (SHO) for dereliction of duty in connection with the murder of Patna based industrialist Gopal Khemka.

title: Naidu releases report of Task Force on Economic Development for Swarna Andhra Pradesh
content: The expert panel has made a host of recommendations to the government on diverse sectors that have the potential to catapult it to the league of progressive States

title: Gujarat launches India’s first tribal genome project to tackle inherited diseases
content: The Tribal Genome Sequencing Project is an initiative by the government to sequence the genomes of 2,000 people belonging to tribal communities across 17 districts in the State

title: A.P. and Telangana resolve key river water issues in New Delhi meeting
content: Both States agree to share data reservoirs and preserve Srisailam project;  KRMB will be headquartered in Amaravati, while GRMB will remain in Hyderabad

title: NHRC issues notice to Delhi and UP government over drowning of two kids in public places
content: Observing that the incidents raise serious issues of violation of human rights of the victims, the commission had issued notice calling for a detailed report on the matter within two weeks.

title: Calcutta High Court dismisses teachers’ petitions against new SSC recruitment rules
content: ‘Untainted’ teachers say they are losing faith in the judicial system to offer them justice and said they are being criminalised for corruption done by government authorities

title: BJP government in Uttarakhand promoting VIP culture: Congress
content: The party questions how the BKTC chairman was allowed to fly to Kedarnath by a chopper despite suspension of service

title: Four arrested for misappropriating CMRF funds worth ₹8.71 lakh using forged cheques
content: The accused are alleged to have forged documents and siphoned off government funds intended for financially distressed applicants

title: Hyderabad’s Bolarum saw highest ozone pollution this summer, says study
content: Between March 1 and May 31, Bolarum recorded 17 days when ground-level ozone levels breached the safe limit — the highest in the city

title: Three held in CBI drive against mule account network across seven States
content: As part of ‘Operation Chakra-V,’ the agency searched multiple locations in Delhi, Bihar, Madhya Pradesh, Kerala, Punjab, Andhra Pradesh, and Rajasthan.

title: J&K making rapid strides on path of peace and prosperity: L-G Manoj Sinha
content: Delivering a lecture at Gandhi Smriti in the national capital, the Lieutenant-Governor says Jammu and Kashmir’s economy had more than doubled over the past five years

title: Agreement for biogas plant in Kozhikode to be signed soon
content: The Corporation will hand over seven acres for the facility, where 150 tonnes of biowaste will be processed

title: Nimisha Priya death row: Consular access provided; MEA says in touch with friendly nations
content: Nimisha Priya, a nurse from Kerala, faced a death sentence in Yemen. The execution, initially set for July 16, 2025, has been postponed. The Indian government is providing assistance to her family. They are exploring a blood money settlement under Yemeni law. Officials are in contact with local authorities and friendly governments.

title: Gunmen walk into ICU, open fire, flee: Murder convict shot dead in Patna hospital
content: A shocking shooting occurred at Patna's Paras Hospital. CCTV footage shows assailants killing a murder convict. The incident triggered strong political reactions. Opposition parties criticize Nitish Kumar's government. They allege a breakdown of law and order in Bihar. Leaders demand investigation and accountability. Another murder reported in Shahpur locality. Concerns rise over increasing crime rates in the state.

title: Intel layoffs: Company job cuts cross 5,000 in July; numbers rise 4x in…
content: Global semiconductor giant Intel is implementing a significant restructuring plan, resulting in over 5,000 layoffs across US locations including California, Oregon, Arizona and Texas. The job cuts, impacting engineers, senior leaders, and back-office staff, aim to streamline operations and address financial losses. This follows 15,000 job cuts earlier in 2024, bringing the total to over 20,000.

title: Tamil Nadu elections: BJP confident of coalition govt, says Annamalai amid EPS pushback
content: Amidst political maneuvering in Tamil Nadu, BJP leader Annamalai expressed confidence in forming a coalition government, suggesting AIADMK should address concerns with Amit Shah. This follows EPS's assertion that AIADMK will independently secure victory in 2026, contradicting Shah's vision of an NDA coalition.

title: EXCLUSIVE: Inspired by 2006 FIFA WC glory, Italy's cricket 'underdogs' take aim at T20 WC
content: Italy, known for their exploits in football and water polo, has qualified for the 2026 ICC Men's T20 World Cup. They defeated Netherlands in the Europe Region Final. Pacer Thomas Draca expressed his excitement at the prospect of playing in India and Sri Lanka in a year's time. He sees this as a beginning for cricket in Italy.

title: Bihar poll gambit: Nitish promises 125 free power units; opposition cries 'copycat'
content: Bihar's Chief Minister Nitish Kumar announced free electricity up to 125 units for domestic consumers starting August 2025, a move hailed by the NDA as historic. The opposition, however, criticized the announcement, accusing the government of copying their schemes and questioning the timing ahead of upcoming elections. The decision is expected to benefit 1.67 crore families in the state.

title: What’s troubling Apple: Economist on CEO factory puzzle; ‘India or China?'
content: Economists criticize Apple's shift towards political appeasement under Trump's pressure, with CEO Tim Cook prioritizing relationships over innovation. Concerns arise over 'corny capitalism,' where political favor dictates corporate success. Apple's supply chain diversification plans in India face hurdles as Foxconn withdraws Chinese engineers, potentially hindering iPhone production and technology transfer, amidst Beijing's efforts to curb exports to India.

title: Tragic! 19-yo cyclist dies after fall during Tour of Aoste Valley-Mont Blanc - details inside
content: Italian cyclist Samuele Privitera, 19, tragically died after a fall during the Tour of the Aoste Valley-Mont Blanc. The accident occurred on Wednesday's first stage, with the cause still under investigation. Privitera, riding for Hagens Berman Jayco, was promptly assisted and taken to a hospital, but succumbed to his injuries.

title: Anand Mahindra's message to Elon Musk on Tesla India launch: Meet you at ...
content: Anand Mahindra welcomed Elon Musk and Tesla to India as the EV company officially debuted with its first showroom, the Tesla Experience Centre, in Mumbai. Mahindra expressed optimism and acknowledged the competition Tesla brings to India's growing EV sector. Tesla has launched its Model Y in India, with prices starting at Rs 61 lakh.

title: IND vs ENG: Ex-England cricketer takes a dig at Jadeja - 'He’s not...'
content: Moeen Ali has joined critics questioning Ravindra Jadeja's all-rounder role after India's loss at Lord's, despite praising his batting. Ali acknowledges Jadeja's tight bowling but notes a lack of wickets. He suggests including Kuldeep Yadav in the team, though fitting him in would be difficult. England currently leads the series 2-1.

title: 'No ties with Satyajit Ray': Bangladesh says house was 'dilapidated, unusable'
content: Bangladesh refuted India's claim regarding the demolition of Satyajit Ray's ancestral house in Mymensingh. They asserted that the structure being demolished has no connection to Ray's family, citing historical records and local testimonies. The land belongs to the government and was leased to Shishu Academy.

title: IND vs ENG: Nair vs Sai ? Former India player makes a blunt assessment
content: Former Indian cricketer Deep Dasgupta suggests replacing Karun Nair with B Sai Sudharsan for the remaining Test matches against England. Nair's struggles at number three, with only 131 runs and no half-century, prompt the call.

title: Shaquille O’Neal threatens to punch Robert Griffin III over Angel Reese
content: NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal has issued a stern warning to former NFL quarterback Robert Griffin III over his negative comments and a racist social media post targeting WNBA player Angel Reese. O'Neal, angered by Griffin's actions, particularly the reposting of a derogatory image, threatened physical violence if Griffin continues his behavior.

title: Trump tariff threat on Russia oil: India not worried about sanctions
content: India's Oil Minister Hardeep Singh Puri asserts the nation's readiness to handle potential disruptions in Russian oil imports, even with possible sanctions from the US and NATO. Alternative suppliers like Guyana, Brazil, and Canada are being explored.

title: Range Rover Velar launched in India at Rs 89.90 lakh: Details
content: Range Rover introduces the Velar Autobiography in India, priced at Rs 89.90 lakh. This flagship trim offers enhanced features and refinement, available in both petrol and diesel. It boasts copper accents, 20-inch alloy wheels, and Pixel LED headlamps. The interior includes Windsor leather seats, a panoramic sunroof, and a Meridian sound system.

title: Nasa to preview US-India radar mission: What is NISAR, when will it launch
content: NASA is set to reveal its collaborative Earth-observation mission with ISRO, named NISAR, which will provide a detailed three-dimensional view of our planet. Launching no earlier than late July, NISAR will employ dual-frequency radar to monitor Earth's dynamic surfaces, including ecosystems and natural hazards.

title: Another IndiGo scare: Imphal flight returns to Delhi mid-air; 2nd incident in 24 hrs
content: An IndiGo flight 6E-5118, en route from Delhi to Imphal on July 17, 2025, returned to Delhi shortly after takeoff due to a minor technical issue. The Airbus A321 aircraft landed safely, underwent checks, and resumed its journey. This incident occurred a day after another IndiGo flight experienced an engine failure and made an emergency landing in Mumbai.

title: ESPYS audience cheers for fake WNBA star Hicks before Gillis exposes truth
content: Shane Gillis hosted the 2025 ESPY Awards, opening with a prank involving a fake WNBA All-Star, "Brittany Hicks," fooling the audience. His monologue included jokes about Caitlin Clark and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, eliciting mixed reactions. The night honored major athletes, but Gillis's humor created an unpredictable atmosphere, dividing opinions between amusement and discomfort.

title: Carlsen falters! Neimann's hilarious reaction goes viral - Watch
content: Magnus Carlsen faced a shocking early exit at the Freestyle Chess Grand Slam Tour in Las Vegas, losing in a playoff to Levon Aronian. Hans Niemann, fresh off online qualification, celebrated Carlsen's defeat with an exuberant reaction that quickly went viral. The event also saw strong performances from Praggnanandhaa, Abdusattorov, and Sindarov, marking an unpredictable start to the tour.

title: Conor McGregor breaks silence: Cryptic tweet after Azealia Banks leak
content: Azealia Banks ignited a social media storm by claiming Conor McGregor, celebrating his birthday in Italy, sent her nude photos. Instead of directly addressing the allegations, McGregor responded to a fan's joke with a political comment about Irish politics. Banks further alleged a long history of nude exchanges and harassment, while McGregor continued posting from his yacht, seemingly unfazed.

title: Bihar’s crime surge: Top cop blames farmers, election heat
content: Bihar police attribute the recent crime surge to pre-monsoon patterns and election-related political attention, citing a traditional rise in murders before the rains. Additional Director General of Police, Kundan Krishnan, announced a new cell to monitor former shooters amidst opposition criticism of the Nitish Kumar government following several high-profile shootings, including a BJP leader and a businessman, intensifying political scrutiny.

title: Bengaluru: Which RCB posts have Karnataka govt cited in court against the franchise; stampede killed 11
content: The Karnataka government has held Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) responsible for a tragic stampede that resulted in 11 fatalities outside M. Chinnaswamy Stadium. Officials stated that RCB, along with DNA Networks and KSCA, organized victory celebrations without obtaining the necessary police permission.

title: Chess | Niemann on Carlsen losing two games – 'Best day of my life'
content: Hans Niemann celebrated Magnus Carlsen's losses at the Freestyle Grand Slam Tour in Las Vegas, even offering to take Levon Aronian to dinner after Aronian defeated Carlsen. Despite finishing second in Group 2 behind Hikaru Nakamura, Niemann expressed immense satisfaction, calling it the 'best day of his life' in two years.

title: Trump to visit Pakistan?: Report says US Prez may go in Sept; India trip to follow
content: President Trump is anticipated to visit Pakistan in September, marking the first U.S. presidential visit since 2006, according to local news channels. While Pakistan's foreign office remains unaware, reports suggest Trump will also visit India following his Islamabad arrival. This potential visit follows a recent boost in U.S.

title: Elon Musk confirms next SpaceX Starship test flight coming soon
content: SpaceX is gearing up for Starship's tenth test flight in early August, as confirmed by Elon Musk on July 14, 2025. Despite a recent upper-stage explosion and previous flight failures, the Super Heavy booster has shown promise. This mission aims to improve reusability and reliability, crucial for lunar missions, space station resupply, and Mars colonization.

title: Man loses memory after crash; wife’s faith leads to reunion
content: Anamika's world shattered when her husband, Deepak, vanished after a phone call. She tirelessly searched, even as despair threatened to consume her. Unbeknownst to her, Deepak was in a hospital, suffering from amnesia after a road accident.

title: Where is phase 2? Musk rakes up Epstein files to target Trump again
content: Elon Musk ignited a social media storm on X, questioning the handling of the Epstein case and taking veiled swipes at Donald Trump. He demanded transparency on the "Epstein Files," probing the existence of electronic records and the whereabouts of crucial evidence. Musk's renewed scrutiny, coupled with past accusations against Trump, fuels speculation about his potential political ambitions.

title: Andhra couple set on fire over toilet dispute; man succumbs, wife critical
content: In Palnadu district, Neelaboyina Pedda Srinu died after being set ablaze. His wife, Mangamma, is critically injured. The incident occurred near Ainavolu village in Vinukonda. Unidentified persons poured petrol on them while they slept. Police suspect a family dispute over land. Neelagiri Venkateswarlu alias Kotayya is the prime suspect. He is currently absconding.

title: You too committed offence by having sex outside marriage, Supreme Court tells woman
content: The Supreme Court questioned a married woman who sought the cancellation of anticipatory bail for a man accused of rape on the false promise of marriage. The court suggested she might face prosecution for engaging in extramarital affairs, highlighting her awareness of the relationship's implications. The Patna High Court's decision to grant anticipatory bail to the accused was upheld.

title: Bengaluru stampede: Karnataka govt blames RCB for crowd surge; cites Virat Kohli video
content: The Karnataka government has blamed Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) management for a deadly stampede outside M. Chinnaswamy Stadium on June 4, which resulted in 11 fatalities. According to a report submitted to the High Court, RCB, along with DNA Networks and KSCA, organized a victory celebration without consulting the police or obtaining necessary permissions.

title: ‘Character assassination’: Why Wipro has to pay Rs 2 lakh for defamation of ex-employee
content: The Delhi High Court has directed Wipro to pay Rs 2 lakh to a former employee, Abhijit Mishra, in a defamation case. The court found Wipro's termination letter contained unsubstantiated negative remarks, harming Mishra's reputation and future employability.

title: Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce support dad Scott Swift after heart surgery
content: Taylor Swift prioritized her family as her father, Scott Swift, underwent a quintuple bypass surgery last month. She paused her Eras Tour obligations to be with him, along with her mother, Andrea, and brother, Austin. Travis Kelce, her boyfriend, offered his support during this challenging time, as the family focused on Scott's recovery following the procedure.

title: NBA trade rumors: Heat eye $49M Lakers superstar as LeBron future uncertain
content: Speculation intensifies as rumors swirl around Luka Doncic potentially joining the Miami Heat, while LeBron James' future with the Lakers remains uncertain. Doncic's contract negotiations are reportedly tense, and Miami is poised to make a move if he seeks an exit. The possibility of LeBron returning to Miami adds another layer to this captivating offseason narrative.

title: Violence during Assam eviction drive: Settlers clash with police-forest team; 1 dead
content: In Goalpara district, Assam, a joint police and forest force team faced a violent clash with evicted settlers in the Paikan reserve forest, resulting in at least one fatality. The authorities were conducting an eviction drive, continuing from last Saturday when 140 hectares of forest land were cleared, impacting hundreds of houses and religious structures built by Bengal-origin migrant Muslims.

title: ‘Saiyaara’ Registers 4th Highest Day 1 for a Debutant-Led Film
content: Saiyaara, a film headlined by newcomers, has defied expectations with a strong opening, grossing Rs 2.59 crore in advance bookings and Rs 4.41 crore overall. This impressive start places it among the top debutant-led films, driven by audience curiosity and effective marketing. The film's success highlights the potential of fresh faces and compelling content to attract audiences.

title: Watch: Amarnath pilgrims washed downhill - yatra suspended
content: Amarnath Yatra was halted on Thursday following a fatal landslide along the Baltal route in Ganderbal, resulting in one death and three injuries. The suspension follows 36 hours of continuous rain in the valley. Authorities have issued a weather advisory, forecasting more heavy rainfall across Jammu and Kashmir.

title: 29 missing in Mandi & Kullu presumed dead; search called off
content: Following devastating flash floods and cloudbursts in Himachal Pradesh, authorities presume 29 missing individuals dead across Mandi and Kullu districts. Search and rescue operations are winding down as NDRF teams withdraw, having recovered 15 bodies but finding no trace of the others.

title: UPSC result 2025 for ESIC nursing officer posts released at upsc.gov.in:
content: Union Public Service Commission declared the final results for Employees’ State Insurance Corporation Nursing Officer recruitment 2025. The exam occurred on July 7, 2024. UPSC aimed to fill 1,930 Group B Nursing Officer positions. 1,893 candidates are recommended for appointment after the selection process. 37 posts remained vacant. Qualified candidates can check results on the UPSC website.

title: 2 men found murdered in MP forest, throats slit
content: In a tragic incident in Madhya Pradesh's Seoni district, two young brothers, aged 9 and 6, were kidnapped and brutally murdered. Their bodies were discovered in a forest, concealed with stones, approximately 13km from their home.

title: Who are Druze? Sect caught in crossfire as Syria-Israel tensions escalates
content: Deadly sectarian violence between Druze militias and Bedouin fighters in southern Syria has escalated tensions, prompting Israeli intervention. Israel, citing a commitment to protect the Druze minority, launched airstrikes after Syrian forces intervened to restore control in Suwayda. The Druze community faces challenges with Syria's new government regarding disarmament and representation, leading to ongoing conflict and a fragile ceasefire agreement.

title: Nuh horror: 17-year-old girl maimed with liquor bottle for protesting rash driving
content: In Nuh, a 17-year-old girl was attacked by two men on a bike after she confronted them about their rash driving. The accused smashed a liquor bottle on her head, causing serious injuries and loss of teeth. While locals noted the bike's number, police registered an FIR three days later, prompting criticism from a Congress MP.

title: Bruins, Penguins, Maple Leafs and more lead top reveals
content: the 2025-26 season is slowly approaching and teams checked another offseason box on Wednesday . the Boston Bruins enlisted comedian Bill Burr to help unveil their schedules . a new schedule has arrived . here's a look at the social media schedule release posts from each NHL team .

content: manchester united have rolled out their away kit for the 2025-26 campaign . the new shirt is the same color as its ancestor from the early 1990s . it's all very dainty and delicate, with minimal trim added .

title: Who has the edge for MVP, Cy Young? Awards Watch at the All-Star break
content: four of baseball's titans have established themselves as the front-runners in the major awards races . it can happen, and if any of these races tighten up, it'll be something to behold . if the season ended today, there would be a few disagreements, according to AXE .

title: Richards delivering on immense potential for USMNT, Crystal Palace
content: Mauricio Pochettino's men's national team could struggle at next year's world cup . defender Chris Richards was the team's best and most consistent player at the Gold Cup . but he's now a near-lock to be in the lineup when the world cup starts in less than a year .

title: Full list of every ESPYS 2025 Award winner
content: the 2025 ESPYS presented by Capital One celebrates the greatest athletes and moments in sports . the show is underway on ABC and ESPN+ . find out who won here . click here for all the latest capital one news .

title: The 20 most interesting storylines at NFL training camps
content: christmas is in December, is four weeks long and comes with a present nearly every single day . it's just around the corner, with veteran players for the Chargers and Lions reporting to camp . there's little I look forward to more than the first video to hit my timeline .

title: The Suns turned a superteam into a costly cautionary tale
content: if the latest era of Phoenix Suns basketball mostly ended last month, it reached its full conclusion . the franchise bought out the remainder of Bradley Beal 's contract, just two seasons after acquiring him . he quickly engineered blockbuster trades for Durant and Beal, who had a combined 16 All-Star appearances .

title: Joel Embiid sees you
content: Embiid was a media darling, both wry fabulist and helpless confessor . he spent two years rehabbing from surgeries to his right foot in the summers of 2014 and 2015 . his son, Arthur, is upstairs preparing for her birthday celebration .

title: Grading 30-plus NBA deals, including Bradley Beal's new destination
content: NBA free agency is underway, and teams are adding stars and making moves to fill their rosters for the 2025-26 season . myles Turner leaves the defending Eastern Conference champions Indiana Pacers for the Milwaukee Bucks . a $52.6 million player option for leBron James with the Los Angeles Lakers .
